long_description: Our REI Maryjane girls' water shoes offer aquatic comfort and grip in a fun style. Soft and comfortable polyester jersey and stretch nylon mesh uppers dry quickly and wrap feet for a secure fit; heel loops aid entry and exit. A secure, comfortable fit is as easy as a simple pull thanks to the adjustable instep straps that secure with rip-and-stick tabs. EVA midsoles offer lightweight cushion for all-day comfort. Durable thermoplastic rubber outsoles on our REI Maryjane girls' water shoes supply ample traction and guard against rough or sharp surfaces underfoot.
short_description: Our REI Maryjane girls' water shoes offer aquatic comfort and grip in a fun style.
